mapper.select: select b.sno, b.grp, b.seq, b.userCode, b.itemCode, b.pwd, b.nal, b.title, b.doc, b.state, i.iName, u.id from user u, item i, board b where u.userCode = b.userCode and u.userCode = #{userCode} and i.itemCode = b.itemCode and b.seq = 0 order by b.sno

select b.sno, b.grp, b.seq, b.userCode, b.itemCode, b.pwd, b.nal, b.title, b.doc, b.state, i.iName, u.id from user u, item i, board b where u.userCode = b.userCode and u.userCode = #{userCode} and i.itemCode = b.itemCode and b.seq = 1 order by b.sno
mapper.update: update board set doc=#{doc} where sno = #{sno}
